posts.title: Naruto Shipudden
posts.content: I was born as a genuis, lived as a villain, died as a HERO

posts.title: AOT
posts.content: This world is cruel, but still I will love you. Even if I sacrifice everything,I will protect you!

posts.title: Naruto Shipudden
posts.content: I go into enemy territory and say you are all surrounded!
